messages.subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] sex in movies
messages.msgSnippet: ... Diana Tashjian Hmmmm, I don t have any references for you Diana.  My instinct tells me that I would try to be as honest as possible about cultural roles,
messages.messageBody:
>>> For an even older child it might be
>>appropriate to discuss sexual roles in culture
......
>>It is difficult to explain these paradoxes in our
>>culture.

>This is exactly what I was trying to get at! I don't
>know how to explain this! Do you know of any books,
>articles, etc. that talk about this stuff?
Diana Tashjian

Hmmmm, I don't have any references for you Diana. My
instinct tells me that I would try to be as honest as
possible about cultural roles, and what is good and
bad about them. THis is a difficult question. I
would like to hear what parents of older children, who
have already dealt with, or are already dealing with
these issues, have to say. Anyone?

Nanci K.
